review.title: “Solid Company”
review.pros: Pros – Ability to take on additional responsibilities and encouraged to grow your own career.
review.cons: Cons – Recent changes to overtime pay is discouraging for staff level employees.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Take care of the people who produce all of your work.

review.title: “Good people, hard times”
review.pros: Pros – Good employees & great compensation. Provided incentive for professional growth and development. Had a number of transportation projects back logged. Workplace environment is excellent and workload sharing between all the offices are utilized.
review.cons: Cons – Management and company structure is constantly changing, during my time with HRG I had multiple supervisor, typically changing each year. HRG implemented the cloud, in principle was a good idea but had major issues of getting the new system to work effectively.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
